DOC.brief_summary: The objective study ass safety , tolerance , food effect , pharmacokinetic pharmacodynamic property single dose adminstration SHR4640 healthy volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Single Dose Study SHR4640 Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Body weight≥50 , BMI:1924kg/m2 ; Screening serum urate level ≤ 4.5 mg/dL male ≤ 3.5 mg/dL female ; Medically stable base physical examination , medical history , laboratory result , vital sign measurement , 12lead electrocardiogram ( ECG ) screening ; History hyperuricemia gout . Pregnancy breastfeed ; History suspicion kidney stone ; serum creatinine＞1.5mg/dl male , ＞1.2mg/dl female ; alanine aminotransferase and/or aspartate aminotransferase＞2 upper limit normal , total bilirubin＞2.5 upper limit normal .
